long_description: The lithe carbon Scott Scale 29er 935 hardtail mountain bike boasts a Fox fork, SRAM 2x10 drivetrain and a responsive, nimble geometry for attacking the trails. Carbon frame has been fine-tuned to maximize power transfer and energy efficiency, and utilizes a race-inspired geometry for agile handling. Weight savings are a focus throughout the frame, using carbon dropouts (with replaceable hanger) and mounts, press-fit BB92 bottom bracket and tapered head tube. RockShox XC 30 Gold TK fork has 100mm of air-sprung travel; bar-top suspension remote control lets you control fork travel without having to take your hand off the handlebar. Shimano XT Shadow rear derailleur and Deore shifters and front derailleur offer reliable, snappy shifting performance throughout the 20 gears. Shimano hydraulic disc brakes use a 180mm rotor up front and 160mm rotor in back for sure braking confidence. Syncros XC39 wheels are outfitted with Schwalbe Rocket Ron Performance Series tires for great all-around traction. Specs on the Scott Scale 29er 930 hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
